In order to meet project or product deadlines you must be able to have a cohesive system that allows all stakeholders to work in real time. If stakeholders are working in silos the time to market or the ability to fix a defect can be more time consuming which will lead to delays. A way to deal with this is to provide complete forensic traceability so that all requirements are linked to a test case. Having requirements linked with test cases will keep your product managers, developers and QA stakeholders all in sync and doing so in real time so that deadlines and goals are met.
  • Create a "verifies" link from example requirement "Some functional requirement representing a system feature. Itemize the detailed..." to test case "Login should be case sensitive"
